title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still unable to access.

title: Payment Gateway Error
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Mobile App Crashing Frequently
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening or when viewing notifications.

title: Feature Request: Multi-Language
description: Customer requested adding Spanish and French language options to improve accessibility.

title: Email Verification Link Expired
description: Verification link in the email expires too quickly after receiving it, preventing users from activating accounts.

title: Invoice Shows Wrong Total
description: Customer invoice total amount does not match selected services during checkout.

title: Website Loads Slowly on Mobile
description: Mobile version of the website takes over 10 seconds to load, affecting user experience.

title: Unable to Download PDF Report
description: User is unable to download generated PDF reports from their dashboard.

title: Lost Data After App Update
description: Customer reports losing saved data after installing the latest app update.

title: Account Locked After Failed Login
description: User account got locked automatically after multiple incorrect password attempts.

title: Dark Mode Not Saving Preferences
description: Dark mode setting resets after every logout, not retaining user preferences.

title: Live Chat Not Working
description: Live chat feature on support page does not connect to available agents.

title: Broken Image Links on Homepage
description: Several images on homepage are broken and not loading properly across browsers.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: 2FA codes are not being sent to usersâ€™ registered devices, preventing secure login.
